title: An Introduction to Cybercrime and Social Engineering
displayTitle:
An Introduction to
Cybercrime and Social Engineering
body: Find out what Cybercrime and Social Engineering is, who does it and what they're after.
instruction: Scroll down to begin the course.

title: Quiz Components
body: Discover what quiz components are available, along with some tips on how to use them.
pageBody:
Without a range of question components, we can’t easily measure if learners are meeting the intended course objectives, provide guidance and feedback if they’re not, or give them opportunities to practise in a ‘safe environment’.

Discover what question components are available, along with some tips on how to use them.
instruction: Scroll down to see what question components are available.

title: Course Assessment
body: Find out more about the assessment functionality, including randomised banks and a results feature.
pageBody: We’ve put together a very short quiz to demonstrate the assessment functionality. In this simple example there are two banks that each contain three questions with two being taken from each bank at random. The order in which the questions are presented is then also randomised, as is the order of each question’s options.
instruction: Think you can get a perfect score? Scroll down to attempt the first question.
